sentences.english: Shaolin Temple is located in Dengfeng Henan province.
sentences.chinese: 少林寺位於河南省登封市。

sentences.english: The most famous systems include Shaolin Temple system and Mt. Wudang System.

sentences.english: In a little over two years, the Berlin temple has grown to 500 8)disciples .

sentences.english: In 1982, wushu champion Jet Li appeared in the film Shaolin Temple.
sentences.chinese: 1982年，武術冠軍李連杰主演了電影《少林寺》。

sentences.english: My master was Abbot Xingzheng. I was born to a devout Buddhist family of several generations of believers.
sentences.chinese: 我師父是當時少林寺的住持，方丈行正老和尚。

sentences.english: Bodhidharma channel-changing Scripture is one of the earliest exercise method that were practiced by Shaolin Buddhist monks.
sentences.chinese: 達摩易筋經是少林寺衆僧演練的最早功法之一。

sentences.english: Monks file to prayer in the Shaolin Temple.

sentences.english: A sea of tourists walks passed the Shaolin Temple in Henan Province.

sentences.english: "Gained merit in battle" reads the epitaph of two of the 231 eminent Shaolin monks honored with shrines in the Pagoda Forest.

sentences.english: Its monks also go on world tours to perform feats .

sentences.chinese: 儘管我是第一次來鄭州，但少林寺的威名早已知曉。

definition: the Shaolin monastery and martial arts school
